dataset_id: BOREAS Follow-On MOD-01 Regional Daily Averaged Gridded Met. Data, 1994-1996
title: BOREAS Follow-On MOD-01 Regional Daily Averaged Gridded Met. Data, 1994-1996
summary: The Phase 3 gridded data sets provided by HMet-01 on an hourly time step have been converted to averaged daily files by the MOD-01 group to reduce the size and number of files used for input to some of the carbon models.

cmr.title: BOREAS Follow-On MOD-01 Regional Daily Averaged Gridded Met. Data, 1994-1996
cmr.summary: The Phase 3 gridded data sets provided by HMet-01 on an hourly time step have been converted to averaged daily files by the MOD-01 group to reduce the size and number of files used for input to some of the carbon models.
cmr.description: The Phase 3 gridded data sets provided by HMet-01 on an hourly time step have been converted to averaged daily files by the MOD-01 group to reduce the size and number of files used for input to some of the carbon models.
cmr.Instrument: TEMPERATURE SENSORS, PRESSURE SENSORS, WIND MONITOR, RAIN GAUGES, VAS

citation: Kang, S., J.S. Kimball, and S.W. Running. 2006. Simulating effects of fire disturbance and climate change on boreal forest productivity and evapotranspiration. Science of The Total Environment. 362(1-3):85-102.
